title: Ticket #28: Add e-mail CC column to tickets
description:
Add the ability to CC yourself to any ticket. Anyone in the CC list will get email whenever a ticket is changed.

By default having the ticket creator and owner (assigned to) on the CC line would make sense.

Also, an option to stop gittrac from emailing you should also be available - maybe a second ticket.
remarks:
2009-Jan-16 14:55:03 by matt:
From FW meeting - Todd says the CC field can be the contact field already present

It needs to be accessible from the ticket creation page as well

2009-Apr-21 08:04:21 by tannenba:
Seems like we have this one done - any number of address can go into the Notify field, and email will be sent to them all upon a ticket change. Resolving this ticket.
